Package org.tigris.gef.properties.ui

Class Summary
ColorEditor FEATURE: color_picker
ColorPickerGrid A small window that allows the user to choose a color.
ColorTilePanel A Panel that shows an array of little colored squares to allow the user to pick a color.
PropsGridLayout A layout manager used by the PropSheets.
PropSheet Class that defines the interface for several different kinds of panels that can edit a group of properties.
PropSheetCategory A PropSheet that shows only properties in a given Category.
RectangleEditor A widget that allows the user to edit rectangles in the property sheet window.
TabPropFrame A window that displays a tabbed Property Sheet user interface with one tab for each PropSheet instance that is added to this object.
